| HistoryText             = Three graduates of [[Anthony Masters (Earth-616)|Taskmaster]]'s Mercenary School in the [[Nevada (State)|Nevada]] desert, the Deadpool Interns consisted of: [[Eclecta (Earth-616)|Eclecta]], who possessed the ability to alter the mass and density of herself and objects in her immediate area; [[Pyron (Deadair) (Earth-616)|Pyron]], able to create mindwaves capable of mentally destroying a target and [[Malovick (Earth-616)|Malovick]], creator of explosives from his own body (although he would only reveal this to Deadpool in whispered tones). The three were tasked with accompanying [[Wade Wilson (Earth-616)|Deadpool]] on a mission to outer space to retrieve a superweapon created by [[Heinrich Zemo (Earth-616)|Baron Heinrich Zemo]].{{r|Deadpool Vol 3 39}}

| Equipment               = The three team members sported matching yellow jumpsuits that signified them as members of the Taskmaster's Mercenary School.
